en.text:
Your home is safe, comfortable, cosy, and makes you feel confident and secure.



Professionals from hospitality and restaurant services created high-quality efficient detergents with formulas that ensure top notch results — OTTAKU.



Our idea is that wherever one stays at or wherever they go to — hotels, restaurants, or cafes — they always want to feel at home there. We know how to create formulas that provide people with this beautiful feeling of clean and safe home.



OTTAKU, professional detergents for domestic households, make you feel really at home.

ko.text:
여러분의 집은 요새, 편안함, 따뜻함, 보살핌, 자신감 또는... 청결입니다.

환대와 외식업 전문가들이 결과가 보장되고 고효율의 가정용 화학제품을 제공해 줍니다.

호텔, 레스토랑, 카페에서 항상 가정의 편안함을 제공하고자 하는데 깨끗하고 안전하게 하는 방법을 저희가 제일 잘 알고 있습니다
